briefTitle: 30-Week Extension to an Initial Combination Study (24 Weeks in Duration) of Sitagliptin With Pioglitazone (0431-064)
officialTitle: A 30-Week Extension to: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of the Initial Therapy With Coadministration of Sitagliptin and Pioglitazone in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus

interventions.name: Sitagliptin 100 mg q.d.+ Pioglitazone 45 mg q.d.
Pioglitazone 45 mg q.d. + Sitagliptin 100 mg placebo q.d.

summary: A 30-week extension to a 24-week study assessing the hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c)- and fasting plasma glucose (FPG)-lowering efficacy of the combination of sitagliptin and pioglitazone in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM) with inadequate glycemic control.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline (i.e., Week 0 of the 24-week Base Study) in Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c) at Week 54

effectByArm.arm: Sitagliptin 100 mg q.d. + Pioglitazone 45 mg q.d.
